title: shonna shol
sahitya:
shonna shol nIyE marandiDappOmO shOdikkat-tiruvuLLam koNDiDalAmO


anupallavi

  ennaiyE sharaN enru vandaDaindOrkku ellAmum nAnAgi rakSippEn enru


caraNam    nalladai allAdu kELAdu en shevigaL nArAyaNA anri kUrAdu en nAvu
 valam vandu un kOvil vaNangum en karangaL nallOr tam sangattil iNaiyum en manamE
 vallavan nI  nenjil vAzhndiDum pOdu illai enrOr Ekkam enakkEdu vAzhvil
 allum paghalum unnai azhaikkinrapOdu AtkoLLa vArAmal ennODEn vAdu
